parameters.name: Point
parameters.description: Array containing the X, Y, Z coordinates of the drag point

title: IDragOperator.IGetDragPoint

parameters.name: Point
parameters.description: Array containing the X, Y, Z coordinates of the drag point

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Unless set to another value by
IDragOperator::ISetDragPoint,
this value is the origin of the component.
